the iv and your hospital bed
this was no accident this was a therapeutic chain of events

verse
this is the scent of dead skin on a linoleum floor
this is the scent of quarantine wings in a hospital
its not so pleasant and its not so conventional

the anesthetic never set in and im wondering where
the apathy and urgency is that i thought i phoned in
its not so pleasant and its not so conventional
and it sure as hell aint normal but we deal we deal

just sit back just sit back
just sit back and relax

just sit back just sit back
